name: Psylosibe Conflict
description:
Psylosibe_Conflict: Merrisa's story is a First Person Shooter with amazing soundtracks, console class effects and catchy  storyline!

Try role of agent of Elvian Empire intelligence.  Merrisa Ein must investigate what happened on Psylosibe planet, but it's not easy. Psylosibe is a part of Humanity's conglomerate. You know only that, you must find artifact of  ancient psylosibes. But not only elfs interest in human's artifact.

Psylosibe_Conflict is a First Person Shooter with free world. Around 6 hours of gameplay. Complete all storyline to know what hiding Psylosibe planet. Unique landscapes and decorations, every level is a different part of story. Use every type of weapons for maximum damage. Get excite in Psylosibe_Conflict.
